original_title: Amana Takaful Insurance ranked amongst Most Awarded Companies by LMD – 2nd Most Awarded Insurance Company in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka’s fastest-growing insurance company, Amana Takaful Insurance PLC has been recognized by LMD on the Magazine’s list of Most Awarded Companies in Sri Lanka. Accordingly Amana Takaful Insurance ranks 5th overall and is also the 2nd Most Awarded Insurance Company in Sri Lanka. The awards and accolades received by Amana Takaful Insurance underscore its commitment to excellence, customer service and industry innovation.

Commenting on the achievement, CEO at Amana Takaful Insurance, Shehan Feisal said, “We’re incredibly proud to have been included on such an esteemed list, and this reflects our dedication to always doing the best and delivering excellence at all times. The awards and accolades we have received highlight our achievements in terms of strategic direction, sustainability, and business objectives, along with customer satisfaction. This provides our people with a sense of pride and accomplishment that helps keep morale up and snowball our winning mindset. Furthermore, the awards we have won, particularly the global recognitions, are important not only to us, but also help to bring recognition to the country. These programmes are also highly competitive and very independent, relying on 3rd party surveys, customer testimonials and extensive submissions on our end. This means that only truly deserving candidates receive any recognition at all. Therefore, we take this opportunity to thank our customers and our people for making it all possible.”

LMD (Lanka Monthly Digest) is a leading Sri Lankan business magazine that provides readers with insightful and analytical coverage of the country’s business landscape. The magazine features articles on a wide range of topics, including finance, management, marketing, and entrepreneurship, among others. LMD is known for its high-quality journalism and has won numerous awards for its coverage of Sri Lanka’s business community. The magazine also publishes an annual edition that ranks the country’s top 100 listed companies based on a variety of financial metrics, and regularly publishes rankings of Sri Lanka’s companies based on a range of datasets, such as Sri Lanka’s Most Awarded Companies.
